price: 47. Maar toen hij tot hen met Onze tekenen kwam, zie! Lachten zij hem uit.
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُم بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ إِذَا هُم مِّنۡهَا يَضۡحَكُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: falammā jāahum biāyātinā idhā hum min'hā yaḍḥakūna
